Aziter 200mg/5ml Suspension should be used with caution in patients with severe kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Aziter 200mg/5ml Suspension may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
However, Aziter 200mg/5ml Suspension is usually considered safe to use in children with mild to moderate kidney impairment. Dose modifications are generally not required in children with kidney problems.

Consuming alcohol with Defender 1gm/0.2gm Injection does not cause any harmful side effects.
Ditocet 5mg Tablet may cause excessive drowsiness with alcohol.
Dehive 2.5mg Syrup should be used with caution in patients with kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Dehive 2.5mg Syrup may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Dare 500mg Tablet.
It is not known whether it is safe to consume alcohol with Dyazide 250mg Injection. Please consult your doctor.
It is not known whether it is safe to consume alcohol with Dexcol AX Syrup. Please consult your doctor.
